name: Samaj Kalyan Evam Bal Vikas Parishad
briefDescription: Vision:-“We visualized a sustainable developed community based upon self dependence, equality, justice, literacy, healthy, their rights and happy full of life for all needy”Mission:-“To empower the oppressed, vulnerable, marginalized and poorest poor specially the women, children and farmers by their multiple development like social, economical, educational, health, WASH and their rights"MAJOR OBJECTIVES:1- To strengthen capacity of CBOs so that they contribute effectively towards improved socio-economic wellbeing of the community by promoting their participation and involvement in sustainable and equitable manner.2- To establish ideal field models and extension of developmental activities on disaster management, livelihood, human rights, health services, sanitation, environment, agriculture, micro-credit facilities, local people’s institutions for self- reliance of poor communities, child welfare and women empowerment.3- To engage in all activities that may reduce the poverty among the public in India, increase the awareness of their rights, health and dwelling and provide support to human being for their welfare in all manners4- To take appropriate steps for mitigation during and after effect of natural calamities like flood and drought.5- To create awareness for health and education the common people about the reproductive and sexual health and rights.
